author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: What the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: A goal is a dream with a deadline.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: Whatever the mind can imagine and believe, it can achieve.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: You are the master of your fate, the captain of your soul.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: The starting point of all achievement is desire.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: Your big opportunity may be right where you are now.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: The way of success is the way of continuous pursuit of knowledge.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: Set your mind on a definite goal and observe how quickly the world stands aside to let you pass.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: Success requires no explanations. Failure permits no alibis.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: Patience, persistence, and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: It is literally true that you can succeed best and quickest by helping others to succeed.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: Action is the real measure of intelligence.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: Every adversity, every failure, every heartache carries with it the seed of an equal or greater benefit.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: You can be anything you want to be, if you only believe in yourself.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: What you are will show in what you do.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: The greatest achievement was, at first, and for a time, but a dream.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: It’s not what you have, it’s what you do with what you have.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: You don’t have to be great to get started, but you have to get started to be great.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: Every man is what he is because of the dominating thoughts which he permits to occupy his mind.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: The person who takes no chances generally has to take whatever is left when others are through.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: Success is achieved and maintained by those who try and keep trying.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: A quitter never wins – and a winner never quits.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: The more you give, the more you get.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: In every adversity there is a seed of an equivalent or greater benefit.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: Strength and growth come only through continuous effort and struggle.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: No man is ever whipped until he quits in his own mind.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: A rich man is not one who has a lot, but one who gives a lot.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: It’s not the position that makes the man, it’s the man who makes the position.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: You don’t have to be a genius to be successful; you just have to have a burning desire to succeed.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: You are what you think.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: Success is the ability to go from one failure to another with no loss of enthusiasm.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: The ladder of success is never crowded at the top.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: Greatness begins with a decision to move forward.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: A negative mind will never give you a positive life.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: A man is what he thinks about all day long.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: Opportunities are usually disguised as hard work, so most people don't recognize them.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: Do not wait for leaders; do it alone, person to person.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: Success is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: Your thinking will determine your success, and your actions will determine your results.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: You can create your own opportunities by concentrating on your strengths.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: If you do not conquer self, you will be conquered by self.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: One of the most important factors in reaching a higher level of achievement is the ability to work with others.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: You become what you think about most of the time.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: The most important thing to do is to get started.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: Keep your thoughts positive because your thoughts become your reality.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: Success in life is the result of your thoughts, your beliefs, and your actions.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: The successful man will profit from his mistakes and try again in a different way.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: Act as though it were impossible to fail.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: What we think, we become.

author: Napoleon Hill
q_text: If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.
